rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a Vastu-compliant reception area, featuring minimal Scandinavian design elements.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light and an open layout that complements Scandinavian aesthetics. Includes built-in shelves for books to accommodate a reading corner.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dining space designed with clean lines and functional design, positioned adjacent to the living room.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian kitchen featuring energy-efficient appliances, natural light, and open shelving. Vastu principles ensure that the kitchen is placed in an auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Larger bedroom with a private balcony facing north for positive energy flow according to Vastu norms. Scandinavian minimalist decor enhances comfort and functionality.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room ensuring privacy, designed with functional storage solutions and light color palette in line with Scandinavian style.

rooms.name: Family Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious family bedroom featuring built-in closets and a small study corner for shared use.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Guest)
rooms.description: Separate bathroom in the guest bedroom area to ensure convenience and privacy.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library with built-in bookshelves and ample natural light, located in a quiet zone of the apartment to enhance focus and calm.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom ensuring privacy. Scandinavian design elements are incorporated for a minimalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: A small balcony space adjoining one of the bedrooms, providing access to outdoor air and views.

openings.description: Climbing staircase connecting the two floors, designed with safety and Scandinavian simplicity in mind.
